member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon
member.summary: BizArk Console utility.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.AppTitleColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to display the app title. A null will use the default console text color.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.AppDescriptionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to display the app description. A null will use the default console text color.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.Start``1(BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConStartOptions)
member.summary: Creates a console object, fills it from the default command-line arguments, then calls its Start method. Also supports Click-Once deployed URL arguments.
member.param: Options for how to handle running the console app.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ParseArgs``1(BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions)
member.summary: Parses the default command-line arguments, retrieved from Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() (ignores the first argument which is the path). Also supports Click-Once deployed URL arguments.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ParseArgs``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions)
member.summary: Parses the supplied command-line arguments.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ParseArgs``1(System.String,BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions)
member.summary: Parses a querystring as command-line arguments. Useful for Click-Once apps that are started from a URL.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ErrorColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to display the error message. A null will use the default console text color.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.UsageColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to display the usage description. A null will use the default console text color.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.RequiredArgColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to display a required argument. A null will use the default console text color.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.StandardArgColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to display a non-required argument. A null will use the default console text color.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.WriteHelp(BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineParseResults)
member.summary: Displays the help for the command-line object.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ErrorMessageTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the title used above the error message.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.WriteError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Displays the exception to the console.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.Out
member.summary: Gets or sets the output stream. If null, defaults to Console.Out.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ConsoleWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the console to use when writing the line. Set to null (the default) to use Console.WindowWidth.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.ConsoleTabWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the TAB in the console. Defaults to 8. Needed for word wrap. However, it is recommended that you do not put TABs in your text since it might not look the way you want it.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.WriteLine(System.String,System.Nullable{System.ConsoleColor},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the value to the console using the given options.
member.param: The color to print the value in. Only works when using the Console.
Number of spaces to put in front of first line of text.
Number of spaces to put in front of following lines of text if the value must be wrapped to additional lines.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaCon.QueryStringToArgs(System.String,BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions)
member.summary: Converts a query string into an argument list that the parser can understand.

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConColor
member.summary: Provides an easy to use mechanism to change the color of the console, and then put it back when you are done.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of BaConColor.

member.summary: Sets the Console.ForegroundColor back to the original color.

member.summary: Gets the foreground color of the console before changing it.

member.summary: Gets the foreground console color being used.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConColor.OrigBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets the background color of the console before changing it.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConColor.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets the background console color being used.

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConStartOptions
member.summary: Start options for BizArk Console apps.

member.summary: Creates an instance of BaConStartOptions.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConStartOptions.CmdLineOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the command-line options for the object.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConStartOptions.PressAnyKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to display before exiting to prompt the user to press any key to exit.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaConStartOptions.ArgErrorWrapper
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display an argument error message. Should be formatted with {message} for the error message.

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute
member.summary: Attribute that can be applied to a command-line object to provide some additional information. Sending in an instance of CmdLineOptions to the parser will override these values.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of CmdLineOptionsAttribute.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of CmdLineOptionsAttribute.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.DefaultArgNames
member.summary: Gets or sets the names/aliases of the default properties for the command-line.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.ArgumentPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the string used to identify argument names.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.Comparer
member.summary: Gets or sets the rule for comparing the names/aliases. By default this is set to OrdinalIgnoreCase.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.AssignmentDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter between the argument name and its value.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptionsAttribute.ArraySeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets array elements separator, default value is ","

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineArgAttribute
member.summary: Command-line object argument attribute.

member.summary: Creates an instance of CmdLineArgAttribute.

member.summary: Creates an instance of CmdLineArgAttribute.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineArgAttribute.Aliases
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of aliases to use for the command-line property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineArgAttribute.ShowInHelp
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag that determines if the property will be displayed in the help.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineArgAttribute.ShowDefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if the default value is displayed in the help.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineArgAttribute.ShowInUsage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if the property is displayed in the usage.

member.summary: Base exception thrown for command-line parsing errors.

member.summary: Creates an instance of CmdLineArgException.

member.summary: Gets the name of the argument the exception was generated for.

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions
member.summary: Command-line options.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of CmdLineOptions.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions.DefaultArgNames
member.summary: Gets or sets the names/aliases of the default properties for the command-line.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions.ArgumentPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the string used to identify argument names.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions.Comparer
member.summary: Gets or sets the rule for comparing the names/aliases. By default this is set to OrdinalIgnoreCase.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions.AssignmentDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter between the argument name and its value. Default value is null (name/value pairs are sent in as individual arguments).

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.CmdLineOptions.ArraySeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets array elements separator. Default value is null (values sent in as individual arguments).

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty
member.summary: Represents a property that can be set via the command-line.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a CmdLineProperty.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.Property
member.summary: Gets the PropertyInfo object associated with this CmdLine property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.CmdLineObj
member.summary: Gets the instance of the CmdLine object that we are populating.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.Name
member.summary: The name of the command-line property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.Aliases
member.summary: Gets the aliases associated with this property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.PropertyType
member.summary: Gets the type of the property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current value for this property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.ValueSet
member.summary: Gets a value that determines if this property was set or not.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.Description
member.summary: Gets the description associated with the property.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets the default value for this property. Used in the command-line help description. Will show any non-null value except for empty strings.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.ShowInUsage
member.summary: Gets a value that determines if the property should be shown in the usage. Defaults to true for required properties.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.ShowInHelp
member.summary: Gets a value that determines if the property should be shown in the help. Defaults to true if there is a description for the property (DescriptionAttribute).

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.Required
member.summary: Gets a value that determins if the property is required. Value comes from System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RequiredAttribute applied to property.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.Parser.CmdLineProperty.ToString
member.summary: Gets the textual representation of this command-line object. Useful for debugging.

member.summary: Gets the number of properties in this collection.

member.summary: Adds a command-line property to the list.

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.IConsoleApp
member.summary: Interface used by BaCon to manage a conole app.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.IConsoleApp.Start
member.summary: The method to call to start running the console application.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.IConsoleApp.Wait
member.summary: Gets a value that determines if the process should pause before exiting.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.IConsoleApp.Help
member.summary: Gets a value that determines if help text should be displayed instead of running the console app.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.IConsoleApp.Error(System.Exception)
member.summary: Called if an exception is raised. Return true to indicate the error is handled. If handled, the BaCon object won't display help or set the ExitCode.

member.name: T:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaseConsoleApp
member.summary: A base class that can be used so developers don't have to implement all the methods.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaseConsoleApp.Start
member.summary: The method to call to start running the console application.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaseConsoleApp.Help
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if help text should be displayed instead of running the console app.

member.name: P:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaseConsoleApp.Wait
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if the process should pause before exiting.

member.name: M:BizArk.ConsoleApp.BaseConsoleApp.Error(System.Exception)
member.summary: Called if an exception is raised. Return true to indicate the error is handled. If handled, the BaCon object won't display help or set the ExitCode.
